chunks.text: Remove duplicates from sorted list.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: I will put a loop.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Right now it is here.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Now see what it means if it is sorted.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: It is a simple thing.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: It is written in a big size.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: It is also written in a constraint that it is guaranteed that the sorted will be in ascending order.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: There is no problem.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: We will use the same thing.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Ascending means that duplicates will be adjacent to simple things.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: So suppose we have taken a pointer which is one.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: We will check whether it is equal or not.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: If it is, we will point it to 2.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Do you understand?

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: If not, we will continue to increase it normally.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Now the condition is that it is pointing to 2.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Which is not a duplicate.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: It means that we will increase the current.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: It will be current at this time.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Then the condition will be checked whether it is equal to 2 or 3.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: It does not mean that the current is increased normally.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: It is now 3.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Then the condition will be checked whether it is equal to 3.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: It means that 3 is equal to the next null of this 3.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: So the 3 points of this 3 will be on null.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: If it is not understood, it will be now.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Let us take a pointer.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: List node name current is equal to which is pointing to the head.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Where the head is pointing, the current is pointing to the head.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Let us put a loop.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Let us see what is written in the while.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: If current dot value is equal to which is the value of current K next.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: What does this mean?

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: This means that the current K next is doing the next by duplicating it.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Do you understand?

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Which is the duplicate of current dot next K next?

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: In the while, if it is not equal, then let it be normal.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: This poor guy, the current pointer is equal to current dot next.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Then we have to return the head in the end.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: There is no point in writing.

chunks.title: small

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: If the current is null, then the null pointer exception will be there.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: So here the current is not equal to null.

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: And now we are checking here.

chunks.title: small

chunks.title: small

chunks.title: small
chunks.text: Current dot next is equal to null.

chunks.title: small
